## Chess.isAttackedBy() method

Checks if a square is attacked by a piece on another square

**Signature:**

```typescript
isAttackedBy(targetSquare: Square, attackerSquare: Square): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targetSquare | [Square](./chess.ts.square.md) | Square to check |
|  attackerSquare | [Square](./chess.ts.square.md) | Square of the attacking piece |

**Returns:**

boolean
